name: The Road Of Good Intentions
description:
The Road Of Good Intentions is a top-down shooter game with weapons inspired on different medieval weaponry, like the chinese fire lance or repeating crossbow to greek fire and a cannon(because why not?). You play the role of a brave hero in the search for something, and you have to rush downwards the rabbit hole all the way to the ninth circle of hell...or that's the idea anyway.

Be sure to support the idea if you liked it, that way, we may see this game complete one day :D
